mapper.select: SELECT project_public.id, user.name as publisher, logo_path, title, tiny_description, publish_date FROM project_public INNER JOIN user ON project_public.s_id = user.id WHERE is_show = 1
mapper.update: update project_public set is_show = #{status} where id = #{pid}
mapper.sql: id, s_id, logo_path, publish_date, title, tiny_description, catalog, academy, caption, direction, type, total_num, cur_num, technology, is_show, establish
mapper.insert: insert into project_public (id, s_id, logo_path, publish_date, title, tiny_description, catalog, academy, caption, direction, type, total_num, cur_num, technology, is_show, establish, detail_description) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tinyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{curNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{technology,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{establish,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{detailDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update project_public
s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
logo_path = #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tiny_description = #{tinyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
catalog = #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
academy = #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

technology = #{technology,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
establish = #{establish,jdbcType=TINYINT},
detail_description = #{detailDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
